p: Seasonal decomposition analysis showed that the monthly number of imported CHIKV cases displayed an increased trend from 2008 to 2015, with a slight decreased trend from 2016 to 2017 ( Fig 4A). Seasonal decomposition analysis also indicated that there was significant seasonality for monthly imported CHIKV cases ( Fig 4B). For the monthly imported CHIKV cases, the strongest positive seasonal effects were found in each January, followed by October, July, February, November and April. The strongest negative seasonal effects appeared in each August, followed by May, September, June, March and December.
